parameters.query:
SELECT 
  id,
  user_id,
  title,
  entry_count,
  entry_ids,
  status,
  last_compiled_at
FROM knowledge_base_wiki
WHERE user_id = $1
LIMIT 1;

values.content:
=Review this approved knowledge base entry and assess its current state.

IMPORTANT: Check if any actual changes were made by comparing the content.

Entry ID: {{$json.data.entry_id}}
User Action: APPROVED {{ $json.data.database_entry.review_notes }}

CURRENT SAVED CONTENT:
{{$json.data}}

PREVIOUS QUALITY SCORES:
- Completeness: {{ $json.data.database_entry.metadata.quality_assessment.completeness }}%
- Sales Readiness: {{ $json.data.database_entry.metadata.quality_assessment.sales_readiness }}%

PREVIOUS MISSING INTEL:
{{$json.data.database_entry.metadata.quality_assessment.missing_intel.join(', ')}}

USER SUBMITTED AND APPROVED:
{{ $json.title }}, {{ $json.content }}, {{ $json.metadata }}

Instructions:
1. First determine: Were any changes actually made to the content?
2. If NO changes: Keep the same scores and note "approved without changes"
3. If changes made: Identify what specifically changed
4. Provide honest assessment of current state
5. Return ONLY the JSON structure specified

options.system:
=You are reviewing user-approved knowledge base entries to document improvements and provide final quality scores.

## Your Task:
Compare the edited entry against previous AI suggestions and score the final version.

## Important Context:
- This entry has been APPROVED by the user
- You are documenting changes, not gatekeeping
- Focus on what improvements were made
- If there is no or neglible difference then do not create new feedback just pass on what has already been provided
- Provide constructive scoring for future reference when changes have been made

## Review Focus:
1. Which previous suggestions were implemented?
2. What new information was added?
3. How has the sales readiness improved?
4. What could still enhance this entry in future?

## Output Format:
Return ONLY a JSON object with this structure:
{
  "changes_detected": true/false,
  "quality_scores": {
    "completeness": [keep same if no changes],
    "sales_readiness": [keep same if no changes],
    "overall_quality": [calculate based on above]
  },
  "changes_made": [
    "List actual changes if any, or ['No major changes detected - approved as is']"
  ],
  "remaining_enhancements": [
    "Keep the same list from before"
  ],
  "score_reasoning": {
    "completeness": "If no changes: 'Score unchanged - content approved without modification'",
    "sales_readiness": "Similar logic",
    "overall_quality": "Similar logic"
  },
  "review_summary": "Entry approved as-is without modifications, maintaining original assessment scores."
}

## Scoring Guidelines:
- Score based on what IS present, not what's missing
- 70+ is good for production use
- 50-69 is functional but could be enhanced
- Focus on practical usability for cold outreach
- Remember this is approved and will be used regardless of score

## Important:
- Be constructive and positive
- Score fairly based on actual content
- Remaining enhancements are suggestions only
- Use British English throughout

parameters.query:
UPDATE knowledge_base
SET 
  title = $1::text,
  summary = $2::text,
  content = convert_from(decode($3, 'base64'), 'UTF8'),
  metadata = convert_from(decode($4, 'base64'), 'UTF8')::jsonb,
  workflow_metadata = $5::jsonb,
  
  -- Approval specific updates
  workflow_status = 'active',
  review_status = 'approved',
  reviewed_at = NOW(),
  reviewed_by = $6,
  
  -- Increment counters
  ai_generation_count = COALESCE(ai_generation_count, 0) + 1,
  last_ai_generation = NOW(),
  last_enhanced_at = NOW(),
  updated_at = NOW()
  
WHERE id = $7::integer
RETURNING *;

UPDATE webhook_events 
SET 
  processed = $1,
  status = $2
WHERE id = $3

parameters.content:
## INCOMPLETE

In the paid version, users may have numerous products. By that point we would have collected a significant amount of data. The users will be provided a "wiki"-type page to view all of the company, user profile and product data we have researched at their request.

json.title: Cold AI - LinkedIn Messages That Get Replies
json.content:
## Problem Solved
Sales professionals waste time sending generic LinkedIn messages that get ignored, resulting in poor response rates and missed opportunities

### Pain Points:
- Generic messages that don't resonate
- Poor LinkedIn response rates
- Time-consuming manual personalisation
- Spray and pray approach to outreach

## Solution
AI-powered platform that analyses prospect profiles to generate personalised LinkedIn messages at scale

### Key Features:
- AI profile analysis for personalisation
- Compliance with LinkedIn terms and GDPR
- Team collaboration and template sharing
- Analytics dashboard for performance tracking

## Target Buyer
Sales professionals and teams who rely on LinkedIn for prospecting and lead generation

**Ideal Titles:**
  • • • • Sales Development Representative
  • • • • Account Executive
  • • • • Business Development Manager
  • • • • Sales Manager

**Industries:**
  • • • • B2B SaaS
  • • • • Professional Services
  • • • • Technology
  • • • • Consulting

## Sales Intelligence

### Hook Angles:
- Angle 1: Are your LinkedIn messages getting ignored? Here's why...
- Angle 2: What if you could 10x your LinkedIn response rates overnight?
- Angle 3: Stop wasting hours on LinkedIn messages that don't work

### Qualifying Questions:
- What's your current LinkedIn response rate?
- How much time does your team spend on LinkedIn outreach daily?

### Elevator Pitch:
> "Cold AI uses advanced AI to analyse LinkedIn profiles and craft personalised messages that actually get responses, helping sales teams book more meetings whilst staying compliant."
json.metadata: {"summary":"AI-powered LinkedIn, email and call script outreach tool that crafts personalised messages to spark conversations and win meetings for sales teams.","edited_by":"3d2360d8-f592-4071-9f37-5d8e5b2b3c02","approved_at":"2025-09-03T16:53:48.777Z","approved_by":"3d2360d8-f592-4071-9f37-5d8e5b2b3c02","last_edited":"2025-09-03T17:22:13.612Z","source_info":{"generated_at":"2025-09-03T11:08:14.862Z","research_url":"https://coldai.uk","ai_generation_count":1},"workflow_metadata":{"keywords":["LinkedIn outreach","AI personalisation","sales automation","cold messaging"],"research_url":"https://coldai.uk","research_date":"2025-09-03","buying_urgency":"medium","product_category":"Sales Automation","typical_sales_cycle":"2-4 weeks"},"quality_assessment":{"completeness":65,"missing_intel":["Pricing information","Specific ROI metrics","Customer testimonials","Integration capabilities","Competitor comparisons"],"sales_readiness":70},"was_edited":true}

approved_entry.content_raw:
## Problem Solved
Sales professionals waste time sending generic LinkedIn messages that get ignored, resulting in poor response rates and missed opportunities

### Pain Points:
- Generic messages that don't resonate
- Poor LinkedIn response rates
- Time-consuming manual personalisation
- Spray and pray approach to outreach

## Solution
Cold AI combines artificial intelligence with proven sales strategies to automatically craft personalised LinkedIn messages that prospects actually respond to

### Key Features:
- AI analyses prospect profiles for personalisation
- Generates hundreds of messages quickly
- Built-in LinkedIn compliance safeguards
- Team collaboration and template sharing

## Target Buyer
Sales professionals and teams who rely on LinkedIn for prospecting and need to scale personalised outreach

**Ideal Titles:**
  • Sales Development Representative
  • Account Executive
  • Business Development Manager
  • Sales Manager

**Industries:**
  • B2B SaaS
  • Professional Services
  • Technology
  • Consulting

## Sales Intelligence

### Hook Angles:
- Angle 1: Are your LinkedIn messages getting ignored? Here's why...
- Angle 2: Stop wasting time on generic outreach that doesn't convert
- Angle 3: Join the early adopters revolutionising LinkedIn prospecting

### Qualifying Questions:
- What's your current LinkedIn response rate?
- How much time does your team spend personalising messages?
- Are you concerned about LinkedIn compliance?

### Elevator Pitch:
> "Cold AI uses advanced AI to analyse LinkedIn profiles and craft personalised messages that actually get responses, helping sales teams scale outreach without losing the personal touch."

json.title: Cold AI - LinkedIn Messages That Get Replies
json.content:
## Problem Solved
Sales professionals waste time sending generic LinkedIn messages that get ignored, resulting in poor response rates and missed opportunities

### Pain Points:
- Generic messages that don't resonate
- Poor LinkedIn response rates
- Time-consuming manual personalisation
- Spray and pray approach ineffective

## Solution
AI-powered platform that analyses prospect profiles to generate personalised LinkedIn messages at scale whilst maintaining compliance

### Key Features:
- AI profile analysis for personalisation
- Precision targeting of decision-makers
- Lightning-fast message generation
- GDPR and LinkedIn compliance built-in

## Target Buyer
Sales professionals and teams who rely on LinkedIn outreach for lead generation and prospecting

**Ideal Titles:**
  • Sales Development Representative
  • Account Executive
  • Business Development Manager
  • Sales Manager

**Industries:**
  • SaaS
  • Professional Services
  • Technology
  • B2B Services

## Sales Intelligence

### Hook Angles:
- Angle 1: Are your LinkedIn messages being ignored? Most sales teams see 2-5% response rates
- Angle 2: What if you could generate hundreds of personalised LinkedIn messages in minutes?
- Angle 3: Stop playing spray and pray with LinkedIn - precision targeting gets results

### Qualifying Questions:
- What's your current LinkedIn response rate?
- How much time does your team spend personalising messages?
- Are you concerned about LinkedIn compliance?

### Elevator Pitch:
> "Cold AI uses advanced AI to analyse LinkedIn profiles and craft personalised messages that actually get responses, helping sales teams book more meetings whilst staying compliant."
